title: PBE RP and IP

replies.body: PBE accounts do not get the weekly RP/IP stipends any longer. Instead, most content is available for only 1 IP, including runes. You can find all the info on what was changed and why in [**RiotAether's post over here**](https://boards.pbe.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/general-pbe-feedback/3Ea1s1JP-211-edit-summary-of-pbe-leveling-iprp-and-pricing-updates)!

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=9m49Bix4,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-07-01T22:31:29.861+0000)
>
> PBE accounts do not get the weekly RP/IP stipends any longer. Instead, most content is available for only 1 IP, including runes. You can find all the info on what was changed and why in [**RiotAether's post over here**](https://boards.pbe.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/general-pbe-feedback/3Ea1s1JP-211-edit-summary-of-pbe-leveling-iprp-and-pricing-updates)!

Hey, I made the PBE account 3 day's ago is what I meant to say. I am level 30 but no beginning RP or IP.

Ahaaaa! Most summoner's get their beginning RP/IP sometime overnight, and if you still don't see yours you probably need to go into the store and attempt a purchase. Player's typically won't see the RP/IP values until they've tried to buy something.

I bought every champion in the game, some skins and runes. 
I tried re-logging to see if I received the RP and IP and its not there.
If I have to wait a bit longer I don't mind.
